divs: Sighting DetailsI saw the very same thing that the person from Pa. reported to have seen on July 14, 2011. It was very bright, low flying , and did not make a sound at all. I sure would like to know what it was that I saw that evening. All I know is what ever I saw was something not of this world and it was REAL. I saw this in West Texas.
trends: There have been 9 other sightings in San Angelo
There were 3 other sightings in San Angelo on or around October 10th 2010
Summary: Bright orange and oval shape orb.
